entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:32 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 5:32 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
